title: Coronavirus Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to remove all negative effects from a player of your choice.
- Use 2 bees to poison a player.
- Use 3 bees to plague all players who visit or are visited by Biohazard members tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- You are immune to poison.

desc:
Post 3387
*It'll be over in a bzzzz.*
